name: Tanjiro Kamado
text: A kind-hearted and determined Demon Slayer who uses Water Breathing and later Sun Breathing.

name: Nezuko Kamado
text: Tanjiro's sister turned demon, retains human emotions and protects innocents.

name: Inosuke Hashibira
text: A fierce and wild fighter raised by boars, uses Beast Breathing.

name: Zenitsu Agatsuma
text: A cowardly boy with great potential who uses Thunder Breathing.

name: Giyu Tomioka
text: The Water Hashira of the Demon Slayer Corps, calm and powerful.

name: Kyojuro Rengoku
text: The Flame Hashira, known for his enthusiasm and fiery power.

name: Shinobu Kocho
text: The Insect Hashira who uses poison and agility in battle.

name: Tengen Uzui
text: The flamboyant Sound Hashira with ninja skills.

name: Mitsuri Kanroji
text: The Love Hashira, known for her strength and emotional power.

name: Gyomei Himejima
text: The Stone Hashira, blind but extremely powerful and calm.

name: Akaza
text: Upper Rank Three demon with incredible martial arts power.

name: Kokushibo
text: Upper Rank One demon, once a Demon Slayer, now a terrifying enemy.

name: Muzan Kibutsuji
text: The primary antagonist, the first demon and leader of all demons.
